text: Georgios Roubanis (15 August 1929 â€“ 11 February 2025) was a Greek pole vaulter. He was born in Tripoli, Greece. He competed at three Olympic Games. He won a bronze medal at the 1956 Summer Olympics. He was the older brother of Aristeidis. He was named the 1956 Greek Athlete of the Year. Roubanis died in Athens, Greece on 11 February 2025, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Greece Category:Pole vaulters
title: Georgios Roubanis
